metadata.title: CVE-2016-9854 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. By calling some scripts that arepart of phpMyAdmin in an unexpected way, it is possible to triggerphpMyAdmin to display a PHP error message which contains the full path ofthe directory where phpMyAdmin is installed. During an execution timeout inthe export functionality, the errors containing the full path of thedirectory of phpMyAdmin are written to the export file. All 4.6.x versions(prior to 4.6.5), and 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9) are affected. ThisCVE is for the json_decode issue.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
